content: in this legal case the court made a decision regarding the division of assets among three heirs the total value of the assets is 9788599 eur including a real estate property and funds in a bank account according to the law each heir is entitled to onethird of the assets but adjustments were made based on the relationships between the heirs and the deceased the first heir who was the partner of the deceased receives the entire share of the assets the second and third heirs have waived their shares allowing the first heir to receive the full inheritance the court fees for the case amounted to 68400 eur which the first heir is responsible for covering the court decision was based on the inheritance act and the civil procedure act the process of appealing a decision is also explained including the time frame and requirements for lodging an appeal these instructions were issued on january 6 2022 in ljubljana
